Welcome to simple_math’s documentation!¶

A collection of simple math operations

simple_math.mod(a, b)¶

The remainder of the divsion.

Parameters
a,bfloat
Returns
a%b
simple_math.poly_first(x, a0, a1)¶

First order polynomial.

Parameters
x,a0,a1float
Returns
a1*x + a0
simple_math.poly_second(x, a0, a1, a2)¶

Second order polynomial.

Parameters
x,a0,a1,a2float
Returns
a2*x**2 + a1*x + a0
simple_math.simple_add(a, b)¶

The sum of two numbers.

Parameters
a,bfloat
Returns
a+b
simple_math.simple_div(a, b)¶

The division of two numbers.

Parameters
a,bfloat
Returns
a/b
simple_math.simple_mult(a, b)¶

The multiplication of two numbers.

Parameters
a,bfloat
Returns
a*b
simple_math.simple_sub(a, b)¶

The substraction of two numbers.

Parameters
a,bfloat
Returns
a-b
